PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE_COMMANDINE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: The available options are based on Sqoop 1.4.4. If you use an earlier version, read the Sqoop documentation in order to find those which are not available.

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPRED_JOB_TRACKER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, DB_VERSION].isHadoop1[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, DB_VERSION].isHadoop2[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, DB_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[]) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM'))

PARAMETER.NAME: HADOOP_USER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, DB_VERSION].doSupportImpersonation[]) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM'))) AND (!DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, DB_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[] OR USE_KRB == 'false')

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE_MULTIPLE_SQOOP
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: Note: If you need to chain several sqoop export using same jdbc driver, please run them in separate subjobs via tRunJob (due to a sqoop cache issue).

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE_CUSTOMER
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: This function only applies for HDP and Teradata
